text: Pavetta axillipara is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==Sources== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Pavetta axillipara. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Pavetta axillipara
